an5.85:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.85:1.3: Akkhamo hoti rupanam, akkhamo saddanam, akkhamo gandhanam, akkhamo rasanam, akkhamo photthabbanam—
an5.85:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.85:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.85:2.3: Khamo hoti rupanam, khamo saddanam, khamo gandhanam, khamo rasanam, khamo photthabbanam—
an5.85:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
